title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: IMT Capacity Building Through Design Thinking-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical problem-solving simulation scenarios by applying the five-stage design thinking process
Learners can transform real-world problems into mathematical models using VR-based tools and apply data visualization techniques
Learners can produce digital portfolios (project outcomes) incorporating peer feedback through collaborative platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
